scripts.start:client: cross-env HOST=dev.notebookapp.com PORT=3003 env-cmd -f .env.client react-scripts start
scripts.start:admin: cross-env HOST=dev.notebookapp.com PORT=3003 env-cmd -f .env.admin react-scripts start
scripts.build:client: cross-env HOST=dev.notebookapp.com PORT=3003 env-cmd -f .env.client react-scripts build
scripts.build:admin: cross-env HOST=dev.notebookapp.com PORT=3003 env-cmd -f .env.admin PORT=3003 react-scripts build
